item.description:
Update: ***Sonja at Game On has confirmed that the Batting Cages WILL be available from 1:00 to 4:00PM so arrive early if you want to use.

Invited Groups by Native Sharon are Boston Social and Cultural, South Shore Singles and Girls Just Want To Have Fun. And Tonya's Boston Happy Hour. Please Update your RSVPs.

Please join us for a 2012 RED SOX NATIVES EXCLUSIVE EVENT!

Join us at Game On! for a Marathon Patriots and Sports Game Viewing Party to watch the New England Patriots take on the Seattle Seahawks on Sunday, October 14.

Come early at 1:00pm to get yourself a prime seat and enjoy some pre-game socializing for the 1:00pm games.

Patriots Game Time is 4:00pm.

Game On! Employee and Red Sox Native Sonja has kindly arranged for us to have 2 sky box sections on the lower level to watch any game we want at 1:00pm, followed by the Patriots game at 4:00pm. Sonja will be providing complimentary appetizers at half time of the 1:00pm Game and before the Patriots 4:00pm game. We will have our own server. The full menu will be available to order food from.

As an added SURPRISE the Red Sox batting cages may be available for any Native wanting to take batting practice. This has been a big hit at past Game On! gatherings. Just ask Mindy.

ALSO we may be able to watch one of the MLB playoff games too! Game times TBD.

There is no event fee for our reserved section.

Arrive early or later, stay for 1 game, 2 games or leave when ever.

Check back for updates.

The Red Sox Natives organized weekly Patriots viewing parties last year with guests from several other invited groups attending. We had a blast with up to 80 people attending at various locations in Boston, Woburn and Wakefield.

Game On! will be one of our venues for watching 2012 New England Patriots games. We have been to numerous Baseball and sports related events at Game On! over the past several years.

Game On! is conveniently located next to Fenway Park and public transportation. Street parking is also available if you arrive early on Sundays.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drinks. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO AND TIP YOUR SERVER.

Space is limited.

We hope to see you there.

Red Sox Natives Team
item.how_to_find_us: Sonja has reserved two Sky Boxes on the lower level. Ask the hostess to direct you to The Red Sox Natives section.
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party Marathon at Game On!-Pats at Seattle Seahawks and More
